title: Yifei‚Äôs Homepage
text:
Research Experience
Academy of Pharmacy, Xi‚Äôan Jiaotong - Liverpool University Suzhou, Jiangsu
Improving online health surveys in China- A Randomized Controlled Trial July 2023 - Present
R,SPSS,EXCEL
‚Ä¢ Project Design and Implementation: Responsible for planning and executing the overall RCT experimental process, including sample selection, data collection, and preliminary data analysis.
‚Ä¢ Clinical Trial Registration and Ethical Approval: Registered a clinical experiment with the China Clinical Trials Registry (ChiCTR) and navigated the ethical approval process.
‚Ä¢ Academic Output: Authored and submitted a research paper on the RCT study, detailing the optimization process of the data collection platform and its significant impact on data quality.
The Autism Research Center, Soochow University Suzhou, Jiangsu
A study on the event-related potential (ERP) in autistic patients March 2023 - June
R, Zotero Neurophysiological Research Project Supervised by Prof.¬†Deming Shu
‚Ä¢ Literature Review: Conducted comprehensive literature reviews to maintain a solid foundation of knowledge in the field.
‚Ä¢ Data Visualization and Analysis: Created graphs based on research data and analyzed differences in EEG patterns of children with autism before and after sensory integration training interventions.
‚Ä¢ Collaborative Paper Writing: Contributed to the writing of academic papers, synthesizing research findings and analysis.
‚ÄúIntervention Effect of Group Sensory Integration Training on Social Responsiveness and N170 Event-Related Potential of Children with Autism‚Äù (published in the ‚ÄúBehavioral Science‚Äù journal)
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/38540505/

title: Yifei‚Äôs Homepage
text:
Project Experience
Investigation of the attitudes towards HPV vaccination April 2023 - May
R, Sojump
‚Ä¢ Survey Design and Implementation: Developed and executed comprehensive survey methodologies and questionnaires to assess the data.
‚Ä¢ Data Analysis and Advocacy Using R: Utilized R to perform detailed statistical analysis, which facilitated a deeper understanding of HPV vaccine awareness and the urgency of vaccination

title: Hobbies and Interests

title: Hobbies and Interests
text:
Piano





I enjoy playing the piano during my free time, both popular and classical music. By the time I graduated from high school, I had achieved Grade 8 from the Royal Academy of Music.

title: Hobbies and Interests
text:
Traveling





China is vast and diverse, with each city boasting its unique culture and atmosphere. I love exploring different places, experiencing their beautiful scenery, and indulging in local delicacies.

title: Experience

Project Experience
Optimizing Healthcare Resource Allocation and Path Planning
